name: Break The Cookie
description: Get involved in an adventure where you can kill the cookie different of ways. Don’t hesitate try out the heavy weapons or choose a special way to break the cookie up. This is more easier than you can imagine…Play it as much as possible to unlock the weapon arsenal. What’s more you allow to surfing between large selection of venues.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 MB available space
